about_the_game:
Where is He Is a Simple Psychological Indie Horror Game, Where the player Unravel the mystery Of WHO IS HE, WHERE IS HE? and why you are here.

As the Eldest Son of the Smith’s Family, you find yourself in a mysterious Mansion Looking for clues to help you solve the murder of your younger Sibling.
Features include:
-Gather resources and locate Key items that will help you survive and further your investigation.
-Keep an eye out for interesting items or structures and interact with them.
Hot tip: Whenever you’re feeling red look around for some green.

So Explore the mystery Within the Smith Family, and decipher the Clues and messages Left BEHIND, And try to survive the evil Within the Smith Mansion.

This is an FPS Horror Game, Single-player, and packed with mystery and horror events.

It's a 30 min horror game or depends on how u play the game.

This game is built on the Unity Game engine By one hard-working developer.

it's an original story written by BustAhavok My best friend and me Leothecrazygamer.

This is a clean game: - No Nudity
- Its TOS Friendly For our Fellow streamers
- No CopyRight Music for our Fellow Youtubers

Thank you all From The bottom of my heart, and I hope you Enjoy the Game as much As we enjoyed Making it.

name: Where is He

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 950 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 6.1a
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Also future releases may require more hard drive space.

short_description: Where is He Is a Simple Psychological Indie Horror Game, Where the player Unravel the mystery Of WHO IS HE And What is your Objective.
